Room.Name: Silk Dreams Backstage Area
Room.ShortDescription: You are behind the stage in the Silk Dreams Nightclub.
Room.LongDescription: The backstage area is not a very smart place to be right now, because all the bouncers are likely to be after you. Nevertheless, you have made your way back here and might as well take in the scenery before being kicked out of the club. The stage is to the north and the dressing room is to the south.
